1.content:
Let's start off with a few options:

Paige- a 28 year old newly remarried woman who has married the slobby Hank and becomes the new mom to his equally slobbed up son. She wants to fit in with her new family and you get to help.
Victoria: the sixteen year old Daughter of a wealthy family who goes from snob to slob in rebellion for being sent to a snooty boarding school.
Claire and Kate: Two seventeen year old sisters who compete in everything and strife to be the best. When one quits and embraces the slob lifestyle,the other refuses to be left behind and wants to prove she can do it better.

Which will it be?
1.title: Choices!

13.content: Where does their slob transformations take place?
13.title: Kate and Claire

14.content:
Emily and Ryoko: A newly married lesbian couple, both decide to become slobby and let themselves go in their marriage.

Freya: A junior in college whose new roommate is a big slob and entices her to join.

Other choices...
14.title: More choices.

choices: Ryoko starts to slob out and Emily joins her.
A year later, Ryoko's a total fat slob but Emily is still thin.
141.content:
Emily sighed happily as she sat next to her wife of seven months, the contrast between Emily's girl next door looks of blond hair and brown eyes with Ryoko's British-Japanese dark hair, dark eyes, and pale skin always making her giddy.

Of course, looks alone weren't what drew Emily to Ryoko. It was the way she acted, always giddy and unafraid to speak her mind.

"Thanks for the meal, love, it looks delish!"

"I'm glad you think so, but wait to taste it, alright?"

Ryoko smirked but nodded and soon enough had the whole plate cleared, a hand on her now taut middle. Opening her mouth, a foul belch ripped forth, followed by an almost as loud fart.

Emily's eyes widened at that. "R-Ryoko...excuse yourself!"

But Ryoko's smirk merely widened and she soon had Emily's hand in her grasp, placing it on top of her taut middle.

"You really should delete your internet history."

Emily gulped at that and started stammering out apologies only to be silenced by a deep kiss.

"It's alright. So you like fat women who belch and fart, it's not anything I haven't seen before. But what I don't like is you not telling me about it."

"I was ashamed."

In response, Ryoko let loose another fart. "Well don't be! Let one loose right now!"

"What?"

"Fart for me, dear."

Emily nodded and soon ripped one, the stench wafting through the room.

"That's it! Now, about those other fat dames that think they can draw your attention away from me..."

Emily's pulse quickened and she felt heat flare to life as she watched her lithe spouse move towards the freezer and soon returning with two full cartons of ice cream.

"Let's just say that I'll be making sure your eyes stay only on me from now on."
141.title: Emily and Ryoko

1411.content:
Three days passed since Emily shared her secret with Ryoko.

Ryoko lay in the bed and yawned heavily. For these 3 days, she moved the table to next to bed and had four meals a day, spending almost all time here for gain her weight more. After until she was fit to burst, they had a fun time a lot...

She sat up and sniffed the tempting aroma from the kitchen in anticipation. 'Emily I can't wait for you~'

It was not long before Emily came and set a lot of dishes on the table. Ryoko stared wide-eyed to see the heavy dinner of 10 covers; pizzas, lasagnas, pastas, buckets of fried chicken, onion rings, many cakes, beer bottles, and so on.

'Whoa, Today's are quite large volume!' She said slightly anxiously. 'I don't know whether I can finish all...'

Emily smiled shyly. 'Don't worry, I'll join you.'

Ryoko fell silent for an instant, and tightly hugged Emily.

--------------

"BUURRP! Ahh, all of these were BELCH so good as usual, Emily!"

The lovers' feast was over surprisingly early. They had sat on a bed and been rubbing each other's painfully bloated belly.

Ryoko's face was beaming with a mischievous smile. 'How do you feel, my love?'

Emily had just huffed and puffed as loud stinky *PPHHHRRRRT!!* fart was flowing out. 'Why can you URRRPP eat such heavy meals that much? I feel sluggish...' She whined.

'That's the first step to becoming slobby fat girl who you like. Are you feeling uncomfortable?'

'Yes'' Emily paused and farted again. 'But BUURRP! feels good too.'

Ryoko guzzled from 3th beer bottle and let out beery belch into Emily's face that had been thickly covered with cheese of greasy pizza. 'Great.'

"I can't believe we ate all...I had thought I made too much..." Emily murmured and closed her eyes.

"Hey, it's too early to fall into the food coma." Ryoko slapped her partner's belly and showed a cellphone in her hand. "I already ordered more food!"
1411.title: Ryoko starts to slob out and Emily joins her.

choices: They go to an All-You-Can-Eat Buffet
They raid their kitchen for whatever food may be left in the fridge
14111.content:
A week has passed since Ryoko and Emily have started gaining together and they've already bloated up a ton, currently weighing 186 and 164 pounds respectively. The fridge and pantry were already filled to the brim with fattening foods and sweets. The tables and shelves all over the house are filled with empty food containers and fast food XL sized cups. In just seven days, these women have already started turning into overweight slobs. As Emily turns on the TV to put on some Netflix, the door bell rings from the front door.

"I'll get it!" Ryoko calls out from the kitchen as she was getting snacks from the pantry. It was the Pizza Delivery Man waiting at the door with five large pies of pizza.

Ryoko slightly opens the door and peeps her head through the open space she made as the only clothing she currently had on was her underwear and a pajama shirt. The Delivery Man was clearly confused by her strange behavior even without being able to see inside of the house where all the bags of snacks and tubs of ice cream were resting on tables.

After paying for the pizza, Ryoko quickly shuts the front door and set's the boxes of pizza on the couch in between where her and Emily will sit. The two then grab all the other snacks they were planning to eat and set them on the floor next to the couch which, in hindsight, wasn't the best idea considering the fact that they were already starting to have difficulties with getting up from lying down in the seats they had in their living room.

"This is gonna be so much fun!" Emily exclaimed, "We're gonna get to stuff our faces while we binge watch shows on Netflix!"

Emily was still a bit hesitant about gaining weight with Ryoko but was starting to warm up to the idea of it lately.

An hour passes and their mouths and hands are covered in stains from all the greasy pizza and cheetos they've been stuffing themselves with throughout the night. Occasionally one of them would let out a burp or a fart and subsequently giggle it off as. Two of the five pizza boxes were resting on the floor by their feet as they now had their own giant tubs of ice cream that they were eating straight out of with a spoon. Eventually, they both passed out at 2 A.M from all the food they ate with Ryoko's head resting gently on Emily's shoulder.

That morning, they woke up at 11 A.M, both completely groggy and stuffed from all the food they ate last night, too tired and full to be able to get up from the couch for half an hour, Ryoko weighing 199 pounds and Emily weighing 181. The most intelligible noises they were able to make were burps, moans, farts, and occasional mumbling in an attempt to speak.

At 12 P.M, when they finally woke up from their drowsiness, their hunger started to finally set in again.
14111.title: One week later...

choices: The two argue over who is the biggest slob. They settle it with a gas contest.
Ryoko gains a rival for Emily's love.
14113.content: Emily and Ryoko both now weighed up to 350 pounds and lived in a total pigsty, their home littered with take-out containers, dirty clothes, and garbage.They even replaced their bath water with mud to become even dirtier when they decided to "wash up." Their lives were one big slobby dream and it was only getting better. What could possibly go wrong?
14113.title: A year later

143.content:
Cecilia : 21 years university student. She begins to go out with handsome and smart boy named Rick, who has enough skill at cooking to make her slob. Rick is at a loss for her change, but may accept it eventually.

Tracy : 13 years girl who looks down on slobbish behavior for now. One day, she finds mysterious fruits in a forest and takes a bite it out of curiosity.
143.title: Other choices...

1433.content:
Samantha: A sixteen year old whose crush has a secret slob fetish. In order to win him from a rival,she's willing to go through some major changes.
Mary: A twelve year old tomboy who loses a belching and farting contest to her slobby big sister and wants a rematch.
1433.title: More girls

choices: Mary resolves to get fatter to be able to beat her sister.
Mary eats a lot of Mexican to refuel.
14332.content:
BBUUURRPP
BBBBBBBBBBUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPP!!
PPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFTTTTT
PPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPPFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFTTTTTTTTTTTTT!!!
Mary panted breathless and out of gas as she looked up at her fat older sister.
"Give it up little sis you can never be as gassy as I am." Kimberly said as she said as she patted her belly.
"Grrrr you may have won this time but I'll beat you eventually." Mary replied.
"Keep dreaming." Kimberly said as she walked out of the kitchen giving off one last parting fart.
Mary gritted her teeth as she stewed in her defeat she was the gassiest person at her school and she knew she could beat her sister if she could just match her weight.
14332.title: Mary

143321.content:
Mary went to the fridge and proceeded to stuff herself with everything she could find. She then removed three two- liter bottles of soda and chugged each one in rapid succession.By the time she was finished, she had gained an impressive gut, but nowhere near what she hoped to achieve. She sank into a chair and let out a wall-rattling belch. "UUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU UUURP! Oh great, why couldn't I have ripped that one earlier?"

Mary's only response was a small fart she let out. Not only was it small, but it barely smelled. What a letdown!

Suddenly, she heard someone coming and grimaced, thinking it was Kim coming to rub it in some more. "Mary, was that you?" That wasn't Kim! Who was it?
143321.title: Mary resolves to get fatter to be able to beat ...

choices: "Okay, I'll help you. I want to slob up too!"
"No! I won't let you ruin your body for a contest."
1433211.content:
Erica was a cute blonde woman who was rather thin, yet not very neat and could burp and fart rather impressively when the right food was involved. She walked in and surveyed her youngest daughter's handiwork with a look that was intended to be stern, but with a hint of amusement behind it. "Lost again? I can smell your sister's victory fart from the other room. Are you eating comfort food or something?"

Mary went on to explain her plan, figuring her Mom might be able to help. Erica had been a strong influence on Kimberly's slob lifestyle after all. Who else would know how to beat her? Erica didn't respond for several minutes until she finally said...
1433211.title: Mary's mom,Erica

14332111.content:
"Really? You'll help me?" Erica noddded. "Yeah, but don't be surprised if I end up beating you both. I was queen of the slobs once and I can do it again." Mary was surprised to hear this and was a little worried that she would soon have two rivals to beat. Then again, it would make her eventual victory that much sweeter. "Bring it on!"

Erica just smirked and went about pulling out the family's emergency food stash. Kim's binges were pretty frequent so the family always stocked up. Mother and daughter then went on to gorge themselves, intending to fatten up as much as possible. They also made sure to eat as sloppily as possible, forgetting all their manners. This was the first step in being real slobs. It soon became a contest to see who could eat the most. Who would be the victor?
14332111.title: "Okay, I'll help you. I want to slob up...

14333.content: Buffy and Rachael: Ten year old sisters who become easily influenced by their slobby baby sitter/
14333.title: Other choices.

143332.content: Angela: A twenty year old living with two male slobby roomates,she slobs up to show she can hang with the boys.
143332.title: No.

1433322.content: Diana: a thirty year old who inherits a fortune and becames very used to being pampered.
1433322.title: No.

14333222.content: Lisa Arnolds: a ten year old who unfortunately becomes a rampaging slob of a blob and terrorizes Ohio.
14333222.title: No.

choices: No,let's move on to other options.
143332222.content: Cathy: A twenty year old who ends up in an Alternate slobverse and must slob up to fit in. Will she become the biggest,fattest,rudest,smelliest slob of all?
143332222.title: Next

choices: Cathy lets herself go, and devours burger after horrible burger!
Cathy watches Ashley pig out instead; she finds out more about this society.
1433322221.content:
"Uuuuuuugh..." Cathy groaned. She felt like she'd hit her head. Where was she? What time was it?! How-

"Oh. Ohhh~..." she groaned, sniffing the air. There was a terribly wonderful smell in the air. It smelled like... like french fries, and burgers! But they smelt so much stronger than she thought they ever could! She stood up and brushed herself off...

...and came to realize she was in the middle of her city's downtown. Except, something was different.

Yes, very different she realized! Everyone around her was monstrously fat! Bellies hung down to their owner's knees, huge, fat bottoms jiggled and swayed, doughy legs waddled under their bodies' immense weight... And it wasn't just a small group, literally everyone looked like this! What's more, they were all so... sluggishly comfortable like that, everyone's fat hands grasping greasy hot dogs, or slurping down what looked like sodas with butter in them! An occasional wet belch echoed through the crowds like clockwork, and clothes were splattered and stained left and right.

Weird as it was, though she could have been describe as merely "pudgy" before, she was now the skinniest girl alive... and she felt like an odd duckling.

She recognized a body in the crowd; her roommate Ashley! Except now, Ashley was stuffing her face with giant french fries, her titanic tummy bursting out from under her shirt and softly gurgling. "Ashley?", Cathy cried out.

"Oh, Cathy!" Ashley mumbled through a mouthful of fries. "I wondered where you were after you left the apartment last night. Damn," Ashley said with distaste, "have you gotten even skinnier since the last time I saw you?!"

"Uh." Cathy replied. It was becoming obvious that whatever was going on here, it was normal.

Ashley belched, right into Cathy's face; her expression was proud. "You know what, that's it. I'm not gonna let you live your life like... that." Ashley said, motioning with a porky hand to Cathy's comparatively-skinny waist. "Sit down; I'm buying. We need to get you rounder!"
1433322221.title: Yes!

choices: They continue porking out, and Cathy experiences more changes...
A week of such food later...
14333222211.content:
Cathy didn't argue; she was starved anyway.

"Yo, waitress!" Ashley belched. "Give my friend here a Quadruple-Bacon Shirt Burster!" A fat waitress nodded, then waddled over, heaving a birthday cake-sized burger while using her tummy like a tray-holder. The waitress eyed Cathy disgustedly, probably because of her skinniness. "Dig in~!" Ashley beamed.

It was huge. It was grotesquely huge. She lifted it off the plate, and splatters of ketchup plopped on her shirt. She looked back at Ashley, who seemed excited. Ugh, Cathy thought; Let's just get this over with.

She bit in. "Oh... Oh, geez..." she groaned. It was so thick, and heavy, and juice filled her cheeks! The sauce was almost a solid by itself, and it took a great amount of effort to just chew and swallow it all! It hit her stomach like a brick, but she couldn't resist tearing into it again! And again! And again! Her belly ached soon after, not even a third of the way through the burger! She paused, but only to let loose a loud, wet belch. "Hur-braaaaaaaaaaahp!"

"Feeling good?" Ashley asked.

"A-A-Hurp!-mazing!" Cathy managed before she bit in again. Her stomach was pooching out several inches, just barely pudging out from under her shirt. And, even though she knew it was impossible, her pants felt several sizes smaller than when she'd put them on the previous morning. But that couldn't be. They were yoga pants, even!



She licked her fingers, wincing in terrible pain as her belly desperately tried not to explode. It was a big, pink, taut sphere of flesh, that looked rather like she'd eaten a beach ball rather than one measly burger. And it felt so heavy... She didn't want to move, or think, or do anything but laze around as it fought to digest. She felt a great pressure build up inside of it...

Phraaaaaaaaaap! "Oh, man, was that me?" she groaned weakly.

"There you go! Now you're acting like a healthy young woman!" Ashley laughed. "What next?"

"M-More?" Cathy smiled meekly.
14333222211.title: Cathy lets herself go, and devours burger after...

choices: They meet up with more of Ashley's fattening friends!
Cathy starts getting worried about how fast she's slobbifying.
143332222111.content:
Ashley continued to cheer Cathy on, and Cathy... continued bloating up, at a scary rate.

She could feel herself changing, slowly, deeply, as she gobbled platefuls of the terrible food up. Her belly was managing to accept everything she shoved down her throat; it was bigger than she'd ever seen it in her life, a large balloon of oozing flesh that inched across her lap and made noises that would have frightened her dearly a day ago. Her body felt softer in her seat, as though she were gaining weight just within the single meal! And the pressure... Every bite felt like it filled her poor tummy up with more gas, and soon her inhibitions were strongly challenged by its sheer pain. Like a balloon warping from too much air, she eventually had to stop caring, the dull ache of a tummyfull of gas greater than any good manners she'd been taught.

"Oh, man... Here it comes!" she sheepishly giggled, letting out a greatFrrraaaaaabbbbt! from her backside.

Ashley laughed a bellowing belly-laugh. Her weird, skinny friend was finally listening to reason! And bursting out of those atrociously-restricting clothes so fast! "You're marvelous! See?" Ashley said, getting out of her seat (with great, gurgly effort). "You've been holding all that gluttony and need in for so long... It was only a matter of time before you really got going!"

Ashley bent over and gave her gassily growing friend a hug, their guts wobbling and smooshing together. "Oh, look at you! I could just eat you up!"

Cathy blushed heavily. She had always been the nerdy, discarded girl, easily forgotten and never praised. But now... She was making an absolute pig of herself, and she was catching girls' and guys' eyes alike!

"Th-Thank you..." she burbled through a mouthful of syrup-and-heavy-cream-covered waffles. Amid the snuggle, she heard (and felt) her friend's stomach gurgle, already hungry.

"Oh, frick," Ashley squeaked from the jab of hunger. "C'mon. I have to show "new" you off to everyone... We'll get some food, too!"
143332222111.title: They continue porking out, and Cathy experience...

choices: Cathy starts adjusting to this world's life.
1433322221112.content:
"A-Ashley, could you maybe not press so hard when you rub my bell-" -Phhhhbbbrrraaaaaaaaaaaappppt!-"

"No", Ashley replied with faux-sass. "No I can't, you bloaty balloon-girl. If I don't help you get alll that gas out, you'd just let yourself inflate with it until you popped, wouldn't you??"

"I-I just still feel rude! And every time I let some out I can feel twice as much bubble up inside of me!"

"Oh, so you have more?" Ashley giggled. Ashley, having started to break down at Cathy's inhibitions, was having something akin to the time of her life. She had become a clingy, blushy, slightly-aroused, slobby Fat Godfairy to Cathy; ready to get her to fill up, belch out and act normal, for once.

"Of course I do, with all that food you- Hey!" Cathy started before Ashley took Cathy's fat gut, and literally shook it, her belly feeling like a shaken soda bottle.

Beeeeeelllch! Fraaaaaaapp hurpbraaaaaaaaaaaap!

Cathy moaned, feeling pressure start to rebuild inside of her. Was this her fate? To become an increasingly more flatulent butterball for the rest of her days? She shook her head. This couldn't last forever. And yet... Her exhibitionistic behavior was still garnering looks of admiration and attraction... and the food was still to die for...

"Oh.. I know what you need!" Ashley beamed, waddling off to a hot dog stand. She returned, a full hot dog shoved into her plump lips. "Here!" she exclaimed through the mouthful of cheap meat. "Eat dis!"

Cathy stuck her tounge out. It was disgustingly greasy! Covered in ketchup, mustard, nacho sauce, butter, with bits of bacon strewn in... she could feel her stomach hanging further over her pants just being within ten yards of it!


"No way, I'll pop!"

"Look", Ashley began, after swallowing her dog whole and belching. "You eat this, without expellin' any gas, well then, you've proved it, you're not a piggish girl. I'll stop trying to get you to relax. But fart or burp once and you'll do as I say!"


It was already unfair to Cathy; her tummy was already upset and wobbling full of gas bubbles. But an opportunity to end this nonsense?

"Deal!" she squeaked, shoving the whole goddamn dog in her mouth.



She had made a mistake.

As she chewed it, she had underestimated how severely thick it all was. The sauces were less liquid and more goop, and as it came down her throat, it moved with the speed of thick caramel. The meat was one of the juiciest things she'd ever eaten, even counting the burger from earlier, and her mouth seemed to fill with meat-juice just as fast as she swallowed it.

After swallowing, her stomach groaned. The thick heaviness fell down her throat, and as soon as it hit her poor tummy, she could feel it stretch, struggling to accommodate the giant hot dog. Her stomach rolls seemed to swell before her very eyes, and after a fit of moaning, she realized it was hopeless. Cathy looked up at Ashley, who was grinning cheek-to-fat-cheek, as she gave in.

Hrrrrroooooooooaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhp! Fraaaaaaaaap! Brrrrrrrrp Huuurrrrrp Fraaaaaaap!

It's all true! she thought to herself, looking over her round, soft body. I'm a pig, a fat, gassy pig! I'll never be able to do anything but eat and get bigger and get fatter, and-


-and why not enjoy it?, she thought to herself, as Ashley rubbed her aching belly, maternally.
1433322221112.title: Cathy starts getting worried about how fast she...

choices: Cathy finds out how she got to the dimension and why.
143332222112.content: Cathy was now close to Ashley's size and was more or less accustomed to the slob way of this dimension. The "other" Ashley had always complained she was a bit uptight anyway so she figured this could be a good experience for her. She spent most of her time lounging around the slobified campus apartment with the "new" Ashley,just eating and doing whatever. It felt so good that she wasn't even considering a way home. One day...
143332222112.title: A week of such food later...

choices: The mall, which is almost exclusively a food court!
1433322221122.content:
Cathy yawned, her massive belly roaring and gurgling and complaining to the point that she knew she couldn't ignore her ravenous hunger any longer. She tugged at her shirt; her swelling body had outgrown her clothes a week ago, and she was still wearing the same lazy clothes as when she'd arrived! As such, they were torn and stretched horribly- her underbelly wobbled and oozed out from the bottom of her shirt more than halfway. Her ever-growing ass was causing problems for her once-comfy yoga pants, as well, as it was nearing the size of two soft basketballs!

She grabbed a breakfast from the kitchen: dozens of pancakes drowned in butter, powdered sugar, and candy, with a beverage of butter and maple syrup, blended together. The breakfast lasted all of six minutes before ending up in Cathy's softening belly.

Fraaaap! "Hey, Ashley! I'm still starved! Let's go to-"
1433322221122.title: Something else.

choices: The alternate version of Beverly, Cathy's nemesis.
The alternate version of Charlie, Cathy's boyfriend.
14333222211222.content:
The two friends drove to the mall and bought something from every vendor. They sat at a table in the center that was big enough to hold twelve people and began to chow down. "Oh Cathy, I'm so happy you've finally started to eat like a normal person" Ashley gushed as she watched her friend wolf down her meal "I was really getting worried about you."

"Well, you know it just took me a while to come to terms with my problem" Cathy replied as she devoured two basketball sized triple chili cheese burgers at once "I just couldn't understand the need for a healthy body." "Healthy? You still look scrawny to me." Both girls turned to see...
14333222211222.title: Mall Trip

choices: Skip ahead to when Cathy is slobbed up
14333222212.content:
Cathy looks around for answers.

Walking around, she notices that all the shops in the city were WallMarts, and instead of American flags hanging around, blue flags with the WallMart symbol on them.

She found her way into the town hall, a massive woman in her twenties sitting at the front desk. She had to be at least 900 pounds, which was average around here.
"Whoa! *BEEELCH* you look starved! Nobody's looked like that since *URRRRR* before Wallmart was in charge."
"What?!"
"You must be from one of those Native reserves. Let me *UUHHHHHRRRP* fill you in.

"In the year 2050, the US government was failing. Soon, the biggest company, Wallmart, came and showed Americans a life of pure stuffing and *URRRRP* happiness. First, all citizens are injected with a weight serum at birth which removes all negative effects of weight gain, and allows them to grow to 1,500 pounds and still be mobile. We're all fitted with gray sweats, blue stretchy shirts, and sandals for maximum comfort. Then we're all given simple jobs and thrive on mega consumerism. You see, the US became one big company, with all it's workers (citizens) fat and happy. And we live each day stuffing ourselves and belching and farting."
*URRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPPP*
The woman lets out a huge burp and rips a massive fart
"Wow, what was a long time to go without a good *Urppp* belch."

She leads Cathy to a room labeled 'conformity room' where a needle is injected into her arm. Her clothes are ripped of her, and she is given the country's apparel.
"You should start to feel hungry in no time. You'll *URRRRP* slob up in no time. Your metabolism will slow to a crawl and you'll feel *BEEEEELCH* lazy"

Cathy walks out of the building. She meets up with Ashley and they decide to go into the local buffet.
14333222212.title: Cathy watches Ashley pig out instead; she finds...

choices: Ashley challenges Cathy to a belching contest!
Cathy challenges Ashley to a fart contest!
143332222122.content: A month later, Cathy was a three hundred pound slob, an average citizen in this world, and enjoying life as a walmart greeter. She and Ashley were lounging around bored one day when one of them had an idea. What was it?
143332222122.title: Skip ahead to when Cathy is slobbed up

1433322221221.content:
Cathy was working at her job, while eating an extra large bucket of deep fried chicken wings, occasionally waving to the fat slobs waddling by with her greasy chubby fingers.

Ashley waddled up to her and challenged her to a burping contest.
In this world, everyone is slobby and farting and burping is just like blinking. So when you fart or belch in public no one even looks over at you. And so Burping and Farting contests have become friendly gestures, like a handshake or a friendly thumb-wrestle.

Ashley starts. She lets out a huge belch which sends a blast of air into Cathy's face.
Cathy took the lid off of her 2-liter jumbo gulp and poured it down her mouth, spilling a bunch on her shirt. Of course, she already had plenty of grease stains on her shirt for grazing on food and slobbing off like everyone else. So she doesn't care.

She swallows and waits a few second, then lets out a huge echoing belch at Ashley/

"Wow! Great *URRP* job Cathy! That was really something!"

"Yeah, I've gotten to be a big *ERRRRUP* slob! I love it here!"

"What should we do next?"
1433322221221.title: Ashley challenges Cathy to a belching contest!

14333222212211.content:
"Cathy, there's a great *BELCH* feeding machine restaurant downtown"
*Ashley lets out a huge fart*
"Feeding machine restaurant?"
"Yeah, sometimes chewing can be hard *URRRP* work. So you can strap a tube in your mouth and eat whatever you'd like with no *URRRP* work."

The two head there via city transit and arrive at a large building with cushioned couches lining all the walls. All the couches have their own feeding tube in front of them.
Cathy excitedly waddles over to one and is greeted by a panel with sever buttons on it. 'Burgers and fries' 'icecream milkshake' 'Mexican' 'italain' and 'candy'

She presses 'burgers and fries' and the tube inserts itself into her mouth.
It tastes just like greasy deep fried burgers and salty fries.
Cathy lets out a big fart of joy and relaxes.
14333222212211.title: Feeding machines.

143332222122112.content:
Cathy has enough and goes to turn off the machine.
She presses a stop button, but it gets jammed. She squirms around, but exhausts herself.
After five minutes of struggle, she's a big sweaty farting blob of fat that can't turn off her machine, and sits back. Because she realizes It will fix itself eventually (or at least she wants to think that, because she's too lazy to do anything about it). She falls asleep.
143332222122112.title: The tube gets stuck!

choices: They teleport back to the regular dimension
1433322221221122.content:
Cathy wakes up two hours later, to see Ashley waking her up with the food tube in her mouth.

She looks down in amazement!
She had bloated to 800 pounds, almost 3X as much as she was.
Sitting down, her belly ran to her knees and her ass took up almost all of the couch. She stood up with a big fart, and looked at her new body.

Her belly was a big blob of rolls with her belly going to her knees. Her legs were big masses of fat, you could barely tell the calves apart from the thighs.
She looked in a nearby mirror and saw three chins on her face.

Amazingly, her clothes fit to her size.

In this world, there was no such thing as fat. The slobbier you are the better you are.

"Cathy! You look beautiful! You gotta get me fat like *URRRRRFFF* you are!"
1433322221221122.title: She wakes up at 800 pounds

14333222212211221.content:
Ashley sat herself in the chair and ate away.
After a couple hours, she was just as big as Cathy.

She let out a massive belch and they both admired Ashley's new massive body.

"Cathy, *URRP*, we're getting big. I think we might need to get *BELCH* fat seats."
Fat seats were invented when morbid obesity reached 90% in the US. They're huge automated beds that roll around with TVs and computers, allowing weights of up to 3000 pounds to roll around and eat freely.


The two waddled over to the fat seat dealership and both bought one.
14333222212211221.title: Fatten Ashley up

choices: The two go back to Ashley's house
143332222122112211.content:
The two slobs roll over to the nearest McDonalds,
They get in and are taken to the nearest FatSeat area.

The waiter waddles back out with trays of burgers and fries.

They both chomped into their burgers with belches and gulped down their sodas happily.
"Wow! *UUUUURP* with bigger bellies we can fir a lot more in them! *URP*" Cathy said
"Yeah! *BELCH*" Ashley put her greasy hands on her mountainous belly and sloshed it around.

The two continued to watch TV while they ate burger after burger.
143332222122112211.title: Go to a restaurant

choices: Chloe stops for some ice cream...
14333222222221.content:
Chloe Edwards was a sixteen year old teenager girl who had long brown hair that matched her tan like skin, wearing a bright blue tube top that went along side with her white daisy duke shorts. Besides all of those things about Chloe, she was an overachieving student who worked very hard and well to get top marks in her classes. Unfortunately because of her workaholic behaviours, she has developed into some sort of 'uber neat freak', a name given to her from her friends and family.

It may sound like a good thing however this behaviour was become overbearing for everyone else. Examples such as the time Chloe unintentionally organised all the papers in the family study and her father couldn't find his documents for work, the time where she re-arranged all the cook books in the kitchen and her mother couldn't find the Easter cake recipes and lastly the time she was over at one of her friends' home and re-arranged her collection of Pokémon cards in the wrong stat regions.

So in the end, everyone finally had enough with her 'uber neat freak' persona and called to an agreement that Chloe needed to see someone who can help tackle her problem. Chloe's father hired a special therapist who would be able to help.

On the day of the appointment, Chloe meet the therapist, John Smith, who told her to lay down on the couch as he got out his pen and paper in preparation.

"So Chloe," he asked. "How did all of this happen?"

"Well, if I can re-call a month ago was doing a class test and I was one of the few who finished first and I couldn't stop myself from cleaning up my line layout, rubbing out minor mistakes and..." answered Chloe was nervously fiddling her fingers together.

"I see... Hmmm... Well I think I know the solution, Chloe if you would kindly sit up please,"

"Okay sure thing Dr Smith, what's your solution?"

John got out from his sit and pulled out a gold pocket watch to Chloe, there he held the pocket watch's chain and held it there in front of her.

"Ummm... what's this?" she said.

"This dear is a test that I usually do with my patients, I want to know how well focused you are, that's all," he replied as he started to swing the watch from side to side.

Chloe sat there and watched as her eyes drifted from left to right from John's swinging watch. Unknown to Chloe's father, he thought he hired a therapist but beside he accidentally hired a hypnotist con-man.

"In the count of three Chloe, you will be in deep thought and the only voice you will be able to hear is mine and mine alone. One, two, three!" he said snapping his fingers.

There Chloe sat with a dazed face staring directly at the pocket watch.

"Your father told me you were quite the neat freak, allow me to fix that," he said with mischievous chuckle. "Chloe, from this day forth you mustn't clean up or re-arrange anything, in-fact you were never this neat to begin with, all you are is this Genius Slob who enjoys her success, having fun, filth, mess and maybe even more. Repeat what I just said"

"All I am is a Genius Slob who enjoys her success, having fun, filth, mess and maybe even more," she said with a creepy monotone voice.

"Good, very good indeed. In-fact let's add in one more thing, if you ever think about tidying something up or someone mentions the world 'neat' you get hungry all of a sudden. Got it?"

"Got it"

"Now then, when I count to three, you will remember everything that I've said but you will be able to re-call any of this. One, two, three!" he said snapping his fingers again.

In a second Chloe jumped back into reality and looking around her surroundings.

"Very good Chloe, I think you are cured," he said with a grin.

"You mean it Doctor?" Chloe said cheerfully. "Oh thank you, thank you very much," getting up from her sit and collecting all her belongs. Once she left the room, John couldn't help but laugh at what he had done.
14333222222221.title: Chloe the neat freak

choices: Arriving home Chloe was greeted by her mother
Arriving home Chloe was greeted by her father
143332222222212.content:
"Yes!" shouted Chloe with joy, for all her troubles were now past her thanks to Dr John Smith. Believing she can now finally feel relax with her life, with her friends and family and also with her education; she felt as if something has turned upside down. However little did she know that everything she knew from her perspective was going to change; starting at that nearby ice cream parlour.

"Oooohh, I could definitely go for some ice cream," she said skipping across to the counter. There she was greeted by a man in a white and yellow uniform. "What would you like miss?" said the man.

"I would like your ultimate sundae supreme with a lot of sprinkles and strawberry syrup please," she answered.

Normally Chloe would usually just have a simple vanilla cone and she'll be satisfied, today however she ordered something that was completely out of the norm that made her slightly giddy with excitement. A few minutes later, the man handed out Chloe her ice cream and Chloe's eyes shot out with shock and surprise. The sundae was filled with huge scoops of ice cream each with different flavourings, chocolate, strawberry and vanilla, each one covered in sprinkles and syrup and lastly there was a huge banana in between the scoops. Paying the man, she grabbed the sundae and walked along to the nearest bench to sit down and enjoy her treat.

Getting herself comfortable, she dripped her spoon into the bowl and swallowed some of the ice cream. After swallowing, her hands started trembling.

"Oh... my god... THIS IS ABSOLUTELY DELICIOUS!” Chloe yelled, making a scene. Chloe then took another piece and swallowed it instantly, soon she ditched her spoon and started using her hands to shovel the ice cream into her mouth, and this was followed by various loud sounds and sounds pleasure.

After eating all of the ice cream, Chloe just lay back on the bench and rubbed her bloated stomach, as it was tight as a drum from stuffing herself. "Oh... UUURRPPP that was great," Chloe said to herself with a belch. As Chloe lifted herself up gently she noticed that she had made a mess of herself as her top was covered with leftover pieces of sprinkles, stains of ice cream and syrup, her hands and face with littered with the sticky remains as well and lastly thanks to her ice cream feast, her belly was starting to poke out a little under her top.

Before she could react, John Smith's hypnosis started to kick in on Chloe’s psyche. Once the effect wore off she re-checked herself again and just smiled.

"Hehehe, that was fun and delicious," she said. "I better get home and tell everyone the good news," walking away from the scene.
143332222222212.title: Chloe stops for some ice cream...

143332222222222221.content:
Cindy Belmond, one of the most popular girls in her school, she was gorgeous, friendly and very determined. Her fashion sense is always up to date, she’s 5'7" with her blonde hair wrapped up into a ponytail. She had perfect, tanned skin and piercing blue eyes. Her C-Cup breasts and trim, yet small butt make her very desirable. These were the very things that made her step-mother, Melissa, 'slightly' jealous about.

Five years ago, Cindy's mother passed away and her father was very heart broken. But over time he was able to let go and move on with his life; when there he found love again in a woman called Melissa. She had curves that any woman or girl would die for. Her black, wavy hair went past down her shoulders, and lastly she's 5'9" with long legs, D-Cup breasts, and a nice bubble butt.

Cindy's stepmother always thought of herself as the most beautiful thing in the world, she had numerous trophies to boast about in her successes in modelling. But some reason she couldn't help herself and be jealous of Cindy's figure. She couldn't stand it any longer and planned out a scheme. Then a thought occurred to her, what would she look like fat? No, not this fat, but as a big fat slob as well.

Cindy never had to diet or exercise like she had to in the past. The more Melissa thought more about this idea of hers, the more she loved it by the second; watching her step-daughter struggle with her weight, acting like a pig and so on.

How was she going to do this?
143332222222222221.title: It's almost like Snow White, right?

1433322222222222211.content:
Smiling with a wicked grin, Melissa knew exactly how she could fatten up Cindy and turn her into a big lumpy slob.

The next day, Melissa put her plan into action and went out shopping to get many things she listed down, thinking Cindy would enjoy. She brought various action/comedy films, all sorts of sodas and a lot of junk food that was filling up the shopping cart. In the cart there were so many different brands cheesy and salty chips, different kind of snacks, cakes, frosted donuts, pizzas, sweets and so on. She knew very well that her step-daughter loved junk food so much and would gladly eat it in any given the opportunity she had.

Along with the shopping, Melissa managed to find some sleeping pills, which she would use to make Cindy lazier and less willing to do anything. A pair of headphones and a blank tape that later on, she will use to record her voice to use on Cindy when she's fast asleep and finally some weight gain powder that she would sprinkle on the food to increase Cindy's fattening journey.

Once she arrived back home, Melissa set all the food out for Cindy to see, grinding the pills and powder all over them and quickly hid them away out of sight.

Some time later, Cindy came back from a friend's place and walked into the kitchen. There her jaw dropped at the sight and smells surrounding her.

"Ah, there's my girl!" Melissa said while pulling out the pizza from the oven.

"Ummm... Mom, what's going on?" Cindy said staring at the massive amount of snacks and stacked collection of films.

"What's going on? Why I figured since you've been a good girl for mommy, I thought could enjoy yourself", lied Melissa in a innocent tone.
1433322222222222211.title: Melissa drugs Cindy's food

1433322222222222222222221.content:
Journal Entry One
May 12 2014

Recently, my research team has discovered an untouched island in the pacific ocean roughly half the size of Rhode Island.
It has a population of roughly 450 people, whom have never been contacted by outsiders.

I will be attempting to assimilate into their society and learn more about their culture.

The most intriguing thing about these people is that they all seem to be hyper obese. There are no dangerous animals on the island, and fruit is at an abundance.
1433322222222222222222221.title: Okay.

1433322222222222222222222.content:
Alright, how about this:

You are in the shoes of Catherine, a teenage girl 100 years in a future where technology and convenience has led humanity to sloth and gluttony.
1433322222222222222222222.title: No.

14333222222222222222222222.content:
Here's an interesting idea:

You travel back in time and convince ancient civilizations that women should be fat and slobby. You then come back to the present and see the changes you have made.
14333222222222222222222222.title: More options

choices: Cassandra still existed, and it had her listed under her pet name, Squishy.
She was no where to be found, I guess you could take the princess in marriage.
143332222222222222222222221.content:
You couldn’t believe it actually worked, that grant had not been wasted, you actually managed to snag the hat of infamous pirate, Edward Thatch, you actually stole Blackbeard’s hat, and shaved off a bit of his beard as genetic proof, and you lived to tell the tale, and that’s not to mention what other great things you’d done on your trip through time, with any hope, you’d have actually fulfilled the intended purpose of the time machine, which you named the Dee Loreon, it’s original purpose was to change history, to make obese, slobby women the standard of beauty, while men stayed the same. First you went to ancient Egypt, and spoke to cleopatra as a “Messenger of Ra”, your message to her was simple, you used a special translator you developed and claimed your language as “the language of the gods”, but you said to her, “Someone of such great bloodline, a queen of Egypt, should live a life of excess, indulge in the greatest your kingdom has to offer, consume with reckless abandon, letting scraps of food rest on your body, release mighty winds from within yourself to display your power, and if other women decide to follow along, let them, but only women, men convicted of doing such shall be sacrificed to Ra, as an insult to the sun for committing such herecy.” She obviously believed you, seeing as you came from a flash of blinding light, and you can tell it worked, because when you traveled just a few years into the future, you met with a much larger, and smellier, cleopatra, who let the mighty winds burst forth from her body, remembering you, you were greeted with a grand banquet, and treated as a god, you also saw a statue in your likeness, they called you Prophet, you even saw two men fight to the death in your honor. That trip ended with a heartfelt goodbye to the Egyptian queen, and you might’ve invented the hug, because you wrapped Cleopatra’s softness in a tight hug, getting a good wiff of her regal scent, then left.

Next was europe in the dark ages, all you did was come forth as a divine prophet of the lord, you convinced the kings of European countries that a true lady lives a life of excess, and pleasure, belching and breaking wind whenever they see fit, that a true lady mustn’t clean after herself, for that is a sign of poverty, if they must clean, they are not truly wealthy, and that a true lady was corpulent, with soft, motherly features. Yet again, you years from that point in time to see if it worked, and luckily, it did, the queens were slovenly and oh so hefty, noble women would show off their grand corpulence to the entire town, usually gracing them with a loud smelly fart towards the end. Peasants were all stick thin, hell, you’d heard stories of peasant women killing noble women, cutting them open, and feasting upon their fat to become the epitome of beauty. You left once more, ending off your final visit to the dark ages by kissing the hand of a morbidly obese, foul smelling princess who was oh so honored to meet you, she even tried to take your hand in marriage, however, while that might’ve been nice, you have prior commitments at home, though you didn’t mention that, you simply politely declined.

Next was the colonials, while the men were off fighting the good fight, for the sake of what was soon to be the United States, you spoke to highly wealthy women, you spoke the word of how they could show their wealth and excess, by doing everything you’d mentioned before, and just as expected, you came back after the war was over, and as usual the wealthy women were slovenly, fat, behemoths with flatulence and belches punctuating every other word. The wealthy women recognized you and commended you for such a revolutionary idea, and more daughters to take your hand in marriage, again, you had prior commitments, though you never mentioned that ever, you just politely declined.

But back to the present, there you stood, in your time travel pod, with a sample of Blackbeard’s black beard, and his hat on your head, you handed a few researchers the sample, kept the hat, after that, you escorted them out of your home and looked out at the futuristic city of Neo York, they changed the name when science fiction started becoming science fact in the early 22nd century, the research was actually spearheaded by your father, because of this you got free seatings in any scientific conference, you looked around and still saw that there was a holoboard advertising your father’s planned trip to the other end of the Milky Way, it still had his face, so at least some things hadn’t changed. Obese women waddled along the street looking like they hadn’t bathed in weeks, there were advertisements for incredibly unhealthy and fattening foods geared towards women, and instead of stick thin models showing off the latest fashion, it was these big beautiful behemoths of women, and you couldn’t have been happier with the results. You then decided to see if your fiancé, Cassandra Rose, still existed in this timeline, you opened your holophone, and checked your contacts and noticed that...
143332222222222222222222221.title: Back to the present

143332222222222222222222222.content:
Okay, here's some new options:
1. Leslie: A girl who is cursed into becoming a slob by a witch for whatever reason that you come up with.
Or...
2. Sheila: A young woman who competes in slobby challenges for money.
143332222222222222222222222.title: Nope

1433322222222222222222222223.content: Roxy: Member of an all-girl gang who slobs up to rise through the ranks.

info.brief_description: You pick various women and turn them into Slobs of all kinds. 'Nuff said!
info.description:
Not much to say here actually. Just various slob scenarios that you have complete control of, but a few rules:
1. No sex or nudity.
2. a belching contest or farting contest is expected somewhere in each story. Both is also an option.
3. male slobs can appear but cannot be the focus.
Edit: A new rule:
4. There are age limits. Kid slobs are okay but no younger than seven and no older than forty.
Have fun!
info.pretty_title: Slob up women of all kinds!
